required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of a Candidate COVID-19 Vaccine (COV003)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Controlled, Phase III Study to Determine the Safety, Efficacy, and Immunogenicity of the Non-Replicating ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 Vaccine

brief_summary.textblock: A Randomized, Controlled, Phase III Study to Determine the Safety, Efficacy, and Immunogenicity of the Non-Replicating ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 Vaccine.

detailed_description.textblock:
There will be 2 study groups and an anticipated enrolment of 5000 health professionals and adults with high potential for exposure to SARS-CoV-2, aged ≥18 years.
All subjects will undergo follow-up for a total of 1 year post last vaccination. Additional visits or procedures may be performed at the discretion of the investigators, e.g., further medical history and physical examination, or additional blood tests and other investigations if clinically relevant

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the efficacy of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 vaccine against COVID-19 disease confirmed with PCR
primary_outcome.description: COVID-19 virologically confirmed symptomatic cases (PCR positive).

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the safety, tolerability and reactogenicity profile of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine: occurrence of signs and symptoms of local and systemic reactogenicity requested during 7 days after vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Occurrence of signs and symptoms of local and systemic reactogenicity requested during 7 days after vaccination (in a subset of 200 participants)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the safety, tolerability and reactogenicity profile of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine: occurrence of serious adverse events
Evaluate the safety, tolerability and reactogenicity profile of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine: occurrence of episodes; intensified disease
Evaluate the efficacy of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine against severe and non-severe COVID-19 disease: hospitalization for COVID-19 disease confirmed by PCR
secondary_outcome.description: Hospitalization for COVID-19 disease confirmed by PCR

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the efficacy of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine against severe and non-severe COVID-19 disease: COVID-19 serious disease confirmed by PCR
secondary_outcome.description: COVID-19 serious disease confirmed by PCR

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the efficacy of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine against severe and non-severe COVID-19 disease: death associated with COVID-19 disease
Evaluate the efficacy of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine against severe and non-severe COVID-19 disease: antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 non-Spike protein (serum efficacy rates)
secondary_outcome.description: Antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 non-Spike protein (serum efficacy rates).

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the humoral immunogenicity of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19: antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein (serum conversion rates)
secondary_outcome.description: Antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein (serum conversion rates)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the humoral immunogenicity of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19: virus neutralizing antibodies (NAb) against live and/or pseudotyped SARS-CoV-2 virus
secondary_outcome.description: Virus neutralizing antibodies (NAb) against live and/or pseudotyped SARS-CoV-2 virus

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess the cellular immunogenicity of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 candidate vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: Interferon-gamma (IFN-γ) enzyme-linked immunospot (ELISpot) responses to SARS-CoV-2 spike protein

arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single dose of ChAdOx1nCOV19 vaccine, 5x10^10 vp + paracetamol
Participants will receive a single dose of MenACWY + paracetamol
Participants will receive two doses of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 vaccine, 5x10^10vp (prime) and 0.5mL boost (3.5 - 6.5 × 10^10 vp), 4-12 weeks apart.
Participants will receive MenACWY prime, and Saline Placebo boost (0.5mL)

intervention.description: Single dose of ChAdOx1nCOV19 vaccine, 5x10^10 vp + paracetamol
Two dose of ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 vaccine, 5x10^10vp (prime) and 0.5mL boost (3.5 - 6.5 × 10^10 vp), 4-12 weeks apart
MenACWY prime, and Saline Placebo boost (0.5mL)

facility.name: Instituto D'Or de Pesquisa e Ensino - I'Dor
Instituto D'Or de Pesquisa e Ensino - I'Dor
CRIE, Universidade Federal de São Paulo
